definition: a process or series of acts especially of a practical or mechanical nature involved in a particular form of work
details:
noun
- a process or series of acts especially of a practical or mechanical nature involved in a particular form of work
= synonyms: operation
- a mode of conducting legal and parliamentary proceedings
- a particular course of action intended to achieve a result
= example: a particular course of action intended to achieve a result
= synonyms: process
- a set sequence of steps, part of larger computer program
= synonyms: function, routine, subroutine, subprogram
